products.name: Poco M3 pro 5G
products.desc: The POCO M3 is a stylish personal device that offers immersive visuals, seamless performance, and long battery life for uninterrupted functioning.

products.name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro
products.desc: Apple's latest premium phone gets everything right. From the luxurious and durable finish, to cameras and display. The Dynamic Island is really cool too.

products.name: ASUS ROG Phone 6 Pro
products.desc: The ROG Phone 6 Pro is a best of a phone, packed with features designed to appeal specifically to gamers, but delivering a great experience overall.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Flip 4
products.desc: Samsung has the most compelling folding smartphone on the market in the Z Flip 4. It's cute, and delivers that promise of a big screen that folds much smaller.

products.name: Google Pixel 5a 5G
products.desc: The Pixel 5a 5G is a very impressive phone that doesn't cost a huge amount of money.

products.name: OnePlus 10 Pro
products.desc: The OnePlus 10 Pro is the consummate flagship phone for 2022.

products.name: Motorola Moto G Stylus
products.desc: The Motorola Moto G Stylus 5G offer a stylus experience at a low price, a difficult combination to come by in the smartphone world.

products.name: LG Chocolate
products.desc: The LG VX8500 or Chocolate is a slider cellphone-MP3 player hybrid that was sold as a feature phone by LG

products.name: Cricket MSGM8 II
products.desc: The phone is a tri-band candybar featuring a QWERTY keyboard, TFT display with 262k colors, 1.3 MP camera, 2.5mm jack, microUSB port and Bluetooth.
